name: The Gacha Ghost Hunting Squad
description:
Note This game was put together as our final project for our Game Development Studio class! Since the game is currently an early prototype, some features are not fully implemented and bugs may be encountered. Thank you!
 Credits Manav Shah - Sound Design, VFX, Level Design, Environment Design, Programming of Enemy AI & Puzzles, Narrative
Tengku Hana Shafikah - Art, GUI, Programming of Player Characters & Gacha Simulation/Systems, Narrative
Created in Unreal Engine 4 Summary You play as a teenage ghost hunter named Taylor, who was unfortunate enough to find himself stuck in a dreadful pocket universe haunted by a mysterious entity. With the help of his ghost hunting squad (whose members can be summoned with a good amount of luck), will Taylor be able to survive his nightmare and escape?

The Gacha Ghost Hunting Squad is an FPS survival horror game with a simulated gacha experience! Hence there's no need to spend any real money... yet. :) Controls WASD - Move
SPACEBAR - Jump
E - Interact
F - Pickup/Drop Items
Q - Use Special Skill
RMB - Use Item
1/2 - Inventory
